thread.title: Ghana legend Tony Yeboah unveiled as newest ambassador for English side Leeds United
thread.title_full: Ghana legend Tony Yeboah unveiled as newest ambassador for English side Leeds United

title: Ghana legend Tony Yeboah unveiled as newest ambassador for English side Leeds United
text:
18:55 CET Ghana legend Tony Yeboah unveiled as newest ambassador for English side Leeds United Tony Yeboah 
Ghana legend Tony Yeboah has been unveiled as the newest ambassador for English second-tier side Leeds United. 
The former Ghana international is hugely regarded as a cult hero following an impressive time at Elland Road. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com Sports News Follow Us I know of two vesselsâ€”vessel of God and vessel of God. Whose vessel are you? By: DR AGYEI TAKYI
